QuestData.Title: The Basics: Hitting Things
QuestData.Description: Alright, mon. We start with da basics. I need ta know dat you know how ta swing dose weapons you're totin' around.$B$BGo thrash dose tiki targets. Take it slowly. Natural-like. I'll watch ya fighting form and we'll go from dere.
QuestData.RewardText: Not bad, mon. Ya have a natural flow to ya swings - you may have a talent for dis.$B$BSome rough edges ta be sure, but we'll get dose ironed out here and I'll teach ya a few new tings as we go.
